A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An insult to Star Wars fans everywhere. A 2.5 hour middle finger to everything Star Wars stands for. An arrogant swipe to two years of fan speculations and external worldbuilding via the expanded canon. Rampant 3rd wave feminism and SJW dogma throttling a once beloved universe. This is a hate letter to Star Wars.\nThat stated\, there were some very good sceens. The Bombing run\, the Acht-to scenes\, Snoke.. These were very well done. Kylo Ren at his best in this film.
